meanings.definition: A catchy song or tune that gets stuck in a person's head.
meanings.sent1: The earworm of the jingle from the commercial kept playing in her mind.
meanings.sent2: That popular song became an earworm for everyone who heard it.
meanings.sent3: The earworm of the nursery rhyme made her hum it all day long.
meanings.sent4: The catchy tune was like an earworm burrowing into his thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The earworm of the theme song was impossible to shake off.

meanings.definition: A persistent and repetitive thought or idea that lingers in the mind.
meanings.sent1: The worry about the test was an earworm that wouldn't go away.
meanings.sent2: Her fear of spiders became an earworm, constantly bothering her.
meanings.sent3: The earworm of needing to check the door multiple times haunted him.
meanings.sent4: The idea of traveling the world was an earworm that played on repeat.
meanings.sent5: The earworm of his mistake kept replaying in his thoughts.
